metadata.name: The Genesis Collection - Sports Lounge
metadata.description: This collection is tier 2 of 'The Genesis Collection' of the Casino Empire game and is labeled 'The Sports Lounge'. The Sports Lounge is a prime location, fully developed virtual land estate that includes: - 5 live wall feed ad spots, feeds 24/7 (jumbo tron on the entrance) - SportsLounge entrance name banner  - 3 Fantasy sports virtual gaming machines - Direct portal into the Sports Venue  Every NFT of 'The Genesis Collection' will eventually become stake in the first Social Casino DAO in the Casinoverse. NFT rarity details are for DAO 'The Genesis Collection' holders only. If you are a holder, please request your access to the Casino Empire Discord channel. To learn more https://www.CasinoEmpire.io
